FieldSet.description: LogicalDisk: CMDB Specifies a representation of a contiguous range of logical blocks that is identifiable by applications such as file systems by way of the Name field. For example on Windows, the Name attribute might specify the hard disk drive name. On UNIX, the attribute might contain the access path /dev/... . The File system application uses this attribute to identify the logical disk for accessing the media.This class is used to model virtual disks allocated to virtual machines.
FieldSet.label: Logical Disk
